headline: Why Is Moderna, Inc. (MRNA) Among the Worst Performing Biotech Stocks in 2024?

(NASDAQ:MRNA) stands against the other biotech stocks. headline: Matt Gaetz Withdraws. Why That Might Be Bad News for RFK.
summary: Shares of vaccine makers Moderna and Novavac climbed as investors speculated that Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s prospects for running the Department of Health and Human Services could be imperiled.

headline: Is Investing in Moderna Stock (NASDAQ:MRNA) Simply Dead Money?
summary: Moderna (MRNA) stock has fallen 71% over the last six months. While there’s still potential for near-term revenue tailwinds in the form of emerging infectious diseases, I’m concerned that the company may never deliver on its pipeline potential. One reason for this is the company’s extraordinary cash burn, and another is that these formative loss-making years may be negatively impacted by changing federal policy with a vaccine skeptic taking to the Department of Health and Human Services. As much
